name: Flashback
desc:
Whenever you declare that you have retroactively done something or set something up, roll+Power and describe the flashback showing how it happened. 

- On a 10+, your setup's good to go; it happens as you say. 

- On a 7-9, your setup happens, alright, but not in the way you want or expect itâ€”there's a hitch or complication to boot. 

- On a miss, you did set it up, surprisingly, but you're either boned in the present, or something boned your prep... which you probably may not be totally aware of, right?
